config.highlight_on_hold.name: Highlight on hold
config.highlight_on_hold.tooltip: Range of scarecrows is highlighted when holding a scarecrow
config.highlight_on_hover.name: Highlight on hover
config.highlight_on_hover.tooltip: Range of scarecrows is highlighted when hovering over any scarecrow with the cursor
config.toggle_highlight.name: Toggle highlighting
config.highlight_source.name: Show highlight source
config.highlight_source.tooltip: Shows which item caused the highlighting, useful for discovering overlapping regions
config.highlight_sprinklers.name: Highlight sprinklers
config.highlight_sprinklers.tooltip: Highlight the effective radius of sprinklers
